long_description: A mod that adds wind charges which allow you to launch yourself into the air. It includes sound effects and fitting textures. Currently, they can't be obtained in survival mode, but I'm working on that.
name: wind_charges
short_description: A mod that adds wind charges as a fun item.
title: Wind Charges
